scripts.jquery-external: cd vendor/edges2 && npm run jquery-external && cd ../..
scripts.jquery-bundled: cd vendor/edges2 && npm run jquery-bundled && cd ../..
scripts.es7x: cd vendor/edges2 && npm run es7x && cd ../..
scripts.es-external: cd vendor/edges2 && npm run es-external && cd ../..
scripts.google-external: cd vendor/edges2 && npm run google-external && cd ../..
scripts.nvd3-external: cd vendor/edges2 && npm run nvd3-external && cd ../..
scripts.d3-external: cd vendor/edges2 && npm run d3-external && cd ../..
scripts.serve-g001: npm run jquery-bundled && npm run es7x && parcel serve views/g001.html -p 8000
scripts.build-g001: npm run jquery-external && npm run es7x && npm run google-external && npm run nvd3-external && npm run d3-external && npm run clean && npm run target-g001
